name: Guanzhuanghe Coal Mine
company_mentions: 山西蒲县宏源集团官庄河煤业有限公司

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E8%92%B2%E5%8E%BF%E5%AE%8F%E6%BA%90%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E5%AE%98%E5%BA%84%E6%B2%B3%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Guanzhuanghe Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in 东开府村, 太林乡, 蒲县, 临汾市, 山西省

operators: 山西蒲县宏源集团官庄河煤业有限公司
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Pu County Hongyuan Group Guanzhuanghe Coal Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Shanxi Hongyuan Group.
